summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Team Performance features for HR/Admin users in Sharda HR HRMS. All core functionality is working correctly including Team Performance tab visibility, employee list display, and detailed performance modal.

minor_bugs.issue: Unauthorized access protection not working properly - returns 200 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests
minor_bugs.impact: Security concern - should block unauthenticated access

passed_tests: Team Performance tab appears for HR/Admin users
Team Performance tab shows employee list with 50 employees
Employee list displays required columns: Total KPIs, Approved, Pending, Avg Score
Employee rows are clickable and interactive
Employee Performance Detail modal opens on row click
Modal displays employee information (name, department, designation)
Modal shows statistics cards (Total KPIs, Approved, Highest Score, Goals Completed)
Tab navigation works between My KPI, Goals, Team Performance, Templates
Backend API /api/performance/team-performance returns correct employee data
Backend API /api/performance/employee-performance/{id} returns detailed performance data
Department filtering works on team performance endpoint
All required fields present in API responses
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix unauthorized access protection for team performance endpoints - should return 401 for unauthenticated requests instead of 200
